results.creditsText: Foodista.com – The Cooking Encyclopedia Everyone Can Edit
results.title: Delectable Roasted Pork Tenderloin With Mushrooms and Tomato Salad
results.summary: Need a gluten free and primal main course? Delectable Roasted Pork Tenderloin With Mushrooms and Tomato Salad could be a great recipe to try. This recipe serves 2 and costs $3.36 per serving. One portion of this dish contains approximately 29g of protein, 9g of fat, and a total of 250 calories. Only a few people made this recipe, and 1 would say it hit the spot. Head to the store and pick up bell pepper, green onion, thyme, and a few other things to make it today. It is brought to you by Foodista. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 1 hour and 15 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 83%. This score is great. Broccoli Tomato Salad with Pork Tenderloin, Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Spicy Chile-Coconut Tomato Salad, and Chipotle Pork Tenderloin with Roasted Corn Salad are very similar to this recipe.

steps.step: Preheat oven to 350.Season pork with grill seasoning.Roast in oven for 40 minutes, or until a thermometer reaches a temperature of 160 degrees Fahrenheit.
Remove from oven and let rest for 10 minutes before slicing.In the meantime combine remaining ingredients to make your salad. Put in frig to chill while pork roasts.
